sentences.en: A compactor can crumple a car into a small cube.
sentences.cn: '压缩机'.''可将汽车压缩成一小块.

sentences.en: A compactor can crumple up a car into a small cube.
sentences.cn: 压缩机可将汽车压缩成一小块.

sentences.en: Dan tore the page out, crumpled it, and threw it in the wastepaper basket.
sentences.cn: 丹把这一页撕下来揉成一团，扔进了废纸篓。
尼龙床单会起皱 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fist is hit, make fist, building of edge of car of two people crumple up.
sentences.cn: 拳头打, 打拳头, 两人打垮车边楼.

sentences.en: He proceeded to crumple up the dollar twenty ( $ 20 ) bill.
sentences.cn: 他接着将钞票搓揉得 皱巴巴 的.

sentences.en: He proceeded to crumple up. He then asked, " Who still wants it? "
sentences.cn: 他开始把这张纸币揉皱, 然后他问道: “ 还有人想要它 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: He seemed to crumple up in front of us.
sentences.cn: 他仿佛就要在我们眼前倒下似的.

sentences.en: She crumpled the paper in her hand.
sentences.cn: 她把手中的纸揉成了一团。

sentences.en: She crumpled up her coffee cup.
She faltered, and he caught her just as she started to crumple.
sentences.cn: 她蹒跚开始折叠着衣服, 而他却嘲笑她.

sentences.en: Some kinds of material crumple more easily than others.
sentences.cn: 有些衣料比另一些衣料容易起皱.

sentences.en: Take care not to crumple your dress by packing it carelessly.
sentences.cn: 当心不要因收放粗心压纵你的衣服.

sentences.en: The catastrophe made her crumple into the floor.
sentences.cn: 这场突如其来的灾难使她彻底崩溃了.

sentences.en: The front and rear of the car will crumple during a collision.
sentences.cn: 碰撞时，汽车的前部和后部会被撞瘪。

sentences.en: The wall was likely to crumple up at any time.
You are so careless that you may crumple the document.
sentences.cn: 你这样粗心,会把文件皱折坏的!

trans.tran_en: If you crumple something such as paper or cloth, or if it crumples, it is squashed and becomes full of untidy creases and folds

trans.tran_cn: 弄皱, 压皱, 变皱, 崩溃, 垮台
trans.tran_en: If you crumple something such as paper or cloth, or if it crumples, it is squashed and becomes full of untidy creases and folds
